title: Week of Character, Courage & Conscience: I Want to Be a Man
description:
22-year-old Tirin was a teen father who ran away from his responsibility, but now he's taking on the task of protecting and raising three children. Dr. Laura: "Make decisions in life with courage and character."

What courage have you demonstrated? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

Order Dr. Laura's book: "How Could You Do That?!: The Abdication of Character, Courage, and Conscience"

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/compare-books-and-courses-by-dr-laura

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
